Plot: When two unemployed telephone pranksters decide to use their vocal "talents" to impersonate a Chicago mob boss and curry favor with organized crime in New York, the trouble begins. It isn't...
Title: The Jerky Boys
Writer: James Melkonian, Rich Wilkes, John G. Brennan, Kamal Ahmed
Actors: John G. Brennan, Kamal Ahmed, Alan Arkin, William Hickey
